As we step into Day 4 of our AFFiNE Evolution series, we're focusing on **seamless collaboration**. Huge thanks to our early supporters of the AFFiNE cloud. Starting today, the AFFiNE cloud will be available to everyone on both the web version and the clients!  With AFFiNE 0.10.0, you can experience **effortless access**, **empowerment with permissions**, and **boundaryless brainstorming**. Join us to streamline your cloud workspace and enhance productivity!


# **The Return of AFFiNE Web Version**


After seven months of unwavering dedication, we are thrilled to introduce the release of our **new and reliable web version**! You can explore it now at https://insider.affine.pro/. Please be aware that the previous website (https://app.affine.pro/) will no longer be updated. The app will retain some of the data for previous users. If you wish to migrate to the insider platform, manual migration may be required. Join us on this new platform for an **enriched experience**!

# **Effortless Access: Simplify Your Start**


Why delay when you can collaborate right away? Sign up and instantly **enable your cloud workspace**, streamlining your entry into a world of teamwork. Forget about the convoluted login processes of the past. Our platform welcomes you with the simplicity of **one-click access**, and we're constantly improving, soon to introduce multi-email support and self-hosting options. Are you ready to connect effortlessly and start collaborating in the cloud?

Need to **keep your data under wraps** while collaborating? Our advanced permission system lets document owners **manage access**. Remember, start with one invite as we roll out even more collaboration tools.

# **Boundaryless Brainstorming: Innovate Together**


Ever thought collaboration could use a makeover? Step into a space where your **team's creativity** knows no bounds with our **page and edgeless whiteboarding**. Why box in your team's potential when you can engage and inspire one another in a dynamic visual space?


### 1. Write: Crafting Extraordinary Knowledge Through Exceptional Writing Experiences


**Start with a blank page**, and see ideas evolve beyond expectations. For instance, when **crafting a blog** on swift memorization techniques, collaborate with others to build a wealth of knowledge. **Embrace a collaborative approach**, harnessing collective wisdom and diverse perspectives to **enrich your content** and **broaden your horizons**. This way, you'll **unlock your potential** and **create something extraordinary**.
